sentence.Network_en: Hardy has often been criticised for an excessively pessimistic view of life.
sentence.Network_cn: 哈代由于对生活持过度悲观的态度而常常受到批评。

sentence.Network_en: They appeared surprisingly pessimistic about their chances of winning.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对胜利的可能性显得出奇地悲观。

sentence.Network_en: There is no reason to be pessimistic about the future.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 形容人性格的词汇 ... persevering 不屈不挠的 pessimistic 悲观的 polite 有礼貌的.
Access 术语表 - Access - Office.com ... 弹出式窗体( pop-up form) 悲观( pessimistic) 数据透视图视图( PivotChart view).
英语专业四级词汇表(全)_百度文库 ... persuade vt. 说服 pessimistic a. 悲看的；厌世的 pet n. 爱畜；宠儿 a.宠爱的.
考博英语词汇 ... pessimist n. 悲观者；悲观主义者；厌世 pessimistic a. 悲观的;悲观主义的 pesticide n. 杀虫剂；农药.

list.abs: 一个标准化的悲观锁（pessimistic lock）管理器。可对 JPA 提供商的二级缓存进行访问，如果缓存可用的话。
悲观锁定（pessimistic locking）仅用于有状态（stateful）或有连接（connected）环境，也就是说，你的应用与数据库有一条连续的 …
封闭式锁定 (Pessimistic Locking) 会在呼叫 Edit 时立即锁定资料录,要等到呼叫 Update (失败是透过 CDBException 机制指定,而不是透过 Update 传回的 FALSE 值).
石油词汇英语翻译(P) ... peso 比索 pessimistic estimate 悲观估计 pessimistic 悲观的.
Carlo for primavera 之风险分析,其各作业项目估计所需工期有三种数值,即乐观值(0ptimistic Value)、最可能值(Most Likely Value)及悲观值(Pessimistic Value)。.

entry.def: Someone who is pessimistic thinks that bad things are going to happen.

example.ex: Not everyone is so pessimistic about the future...
example.tran: 不是每个人都对未来如此悲观。

example.ex: Hardy has often been criticised for an excessively pessimistic view of life.
example.tran: 哈代由于对生活持过度悲观的态度而常常受到批评。

means.word_mean: 1. expecting the worst in this worst of all possible worlds
